Dashboard.title: Welcome
Dashboard.subtitle: What do you want to do today?

Splitwise.split_info: The Money split simplifies expense management and promotes financial fairness among friends.
Splitwise.splitlist_info: To access more actions, swipe the card in either direction.
Splitwise.validation_add_friends: Please enter a friend to add
Splitwise.select_person_paid: Please select person who paid the amount
Splitwise.input_val: Please enter something about your split.
Splitwise.money_help_info: Allows users to effortlessly add friends, manage expenses, add notes, and display the split amount as an invoice.
Splitwise.add_friend_info: Friends are like stars. You don't always see them, but you know they're always there.

Settings.clear_all_val: Do you want to erase all data related to the app?
Settings.double_tab_info: Double tab to view app features

Common.deleteItem: Are you sure you want to remove this item?
Common.deleteAllItem: Do you want to delete all item?

checklist.info: Gather all necessary materials and supplies. Review and revise the checklist as needed to ensure accuracy and efficiency. Enjoy your journey!!!
checklist.input_val: Please enter something about your trip.
checklist.return_val: Please set reminder for your return.
checklist.item_missing: Item Missing, To continue with missing item, Please click on check box
checklist.checklist_help_info: Create and maintain personalized lists, ensuring they remember all necessary items during their journeys.

Touristplace.district_info: To view information on any district, please click on it.
Touristplace.settingsPermissionGrantMsg: You have denied location morethan 2 times, You need to grand permission from mobile settings
Touristplace.location_alert: Please wait, we are accessing your current location...
Touristplace.location_denied: You have denied access to location.
Touristplace.location_request_again: Click here to request location again.
Touristplace.must_grant_or_exit: You must grant all permissions to continue using this app
Touristplace.allow_blocked_permissions: Some permissions where denied more than once, please enable them from settings
Touristplace.viewgmaploc: To view the driving route on Google Map, tap on Card View.
Touristplace.recieveLocation: Click on get location and recieve your needed location and click done to exit google map view
Touristplace.tourist_help_info: Efficient expense tracking and splitting among friends or travelers.

CostPlanner.info_1: 15% savings are added by turning off the air conditioner
CostPlanner.info_2: 20% savings are added by a non-aggressive driving style with smooth acceleration / braking, at 2000-2500 RPM
CostPlanner.info_4: 5% savings add off low beam/high beam
CostPlanner.info_5: Do not forget to periodically check the technical condition of the car, because some kind of malfunction, for example, a clogged fuel filter or low tire pressure can increase fuel consumption at times!
CostPlanner.cost_help_inof: Users can calculate distance, mileage, and cost by inputting fuel price, mileage, and distance.

Quotes.quote_1: A well-prepared traveler is a confident adventurer. A checklist ensures you never leave behind the essentials, turning your trip into a worry-free experience.
Quotes.quote_2: Checklists are the backbone of a successful journey. They help us remember the small things that make a big difference and ensure our trips are filled with joy, not regret.
Quotes.quote_3: Splitwise takes the hassle out of money matters, bringing harmony to group expenses and keeping friendships intact.
Quotes.quote_4: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
Quotes.quote_5: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only one page.
Quotes.quote_6: Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness.
Quotes.quote_7: A budget is telling your money where to go instead of wondering where it went.
Quotes.quote_8: Travel doesn't have to break the bank. With careful planning and budgeting, you can create incredible adventures within your means.
